mms.controller.interfaces

Interface IEditableShopController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditableShopController

    public interface IEditableShopController
    Interface that define EditableShopController.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doConfirm(java.lang.String address, java.lang.String telephone, java.lang.String admin)
      Creates a new shop, if it already exists it updates it.
      void doFill()
      Finds all the admins present and fills the combo box with their infos.
      Shop getEditableShop()
      Gets a specific shop.

        Gets a specific shop.
        Returns:

      • doConfirm

        void doConfirm(java.lang.String address,
             java.lang.String telephone,
             java.lang.String admin)
        Creates a new shop, if it already exists it updates it.
        Parameters:
        address - the shop's address
        telephone - the shop's telephone
        admin - the shop's admin username
